name: Tale of Shadows
description:
Tales of Shadows is a brand new JRPG created in RPG Maker MZ featuring almost no RTP! Join Aldor as he searches for his missing father, followed by his friends Torra and Belle, as they scour the continent in search of the lost land of Paradise.

Features:

  • Active Time Battle System
  • Unique Rune System for Skills
  • Over 500 Skills in the Full Game
  • 3 Playable Characters
  • An Hour of Gameplay
  • Almost no RTP (Default Engine Graphics)
